snippet.title: Iridescence Trailer (v1.1)
snippet.description:
Iridescence is available now on all platforms! 🎉
🚂 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3282460
🍎 iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/iridescence/id6740209786
🤖 Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.neonight.iridescence

Immerse yourself in a serene Mediterranean island where the worlds of the land and sea intertwine. Embark on a heart-warming, epic journey to help a mysterious girl from the sea find her way home. 🏝️

Having always felt adrift in your own life, you'll meet enigmatic characters who will not only help you unearth the island's rich mythology, but unlock hidden truths within yourself! 🔍

This fresh take on a visual novel features breath-taking artwork and music that will move you to tears, so what are you waiting for? Come and join Ayasal on a poignant adventure that you will carry in your heart forever! 💙
